response.overview: A surreal story...  Qigong-master Lina has a strong bond with her students. All struggling with life issues, they respect their master deeply and are faithful followers. One day a new student joins class: Leo. He is the opposite of Lina's students, down-to-earth and not spiritual at all. But he's intrigued by Lina and feels an unexplainable strong connection with her. Bit by bit their worlds entangle and Lina's spiritual power affects Leo more and more. His reality is fading away. A collision is inevitable. The fragmented pieces whirl down.
response.tagline: Qigong Master Lina leads her students in their spiritual quest. Leo, far from spiritual, is touched by Lina. He gets lost in a world that is strange to him. His reality is fading away.
response.title: The Fragmented Whole
